parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The name of the privileged account of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance. You do not need to specify this parameter if you have no privileged account.

parameters.name: DbInstType
parameters.description: The engine type of the storage-layer databases. Valid values: **POLARDB** and **RDS**.

parameters.name: DbInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance in which the storage-layer databases are deployed.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password of the privileged account. You do not need to specify this parameter if you have no privileged account.
